metadata.name: THROW STONE #1
metadata.description: A total of 1125 “THROW STONE” NFTs are airdropped exclusively for “People In The Place They Love” holders as community rewards, created by FWENCLUB. With 250 editions of 4 designs, this special digital art piece could be used to embellish your space as a fine detailed ornament in METAVERSE. 125  pieces of special edition will be reserved for wood panel raffle winners. The art is inspired by a notable sculpture by Yusuke Hanai, which he would like to applaud people who fight hard against tough times through this work.
